Author: lightningmcqueef69
Text: amazing!! having friends who get it, even if it's unspoken, is so relieving. even before i opened up about my ED, my coworker (now roommate/boyfriend??) picked up that i was weird about food and he's always been incredibly understanding and respectful while also pushing me to take care of myself. living with him has made stepping into recovery so much less terrifying.

Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: I love hearing the wins in understanding friends on this sub. we hear so many horror stories it's nice to hear the good ones too.
